垗字的基本解释

垗
zhào
祭坛四周土墙以内的地方。
墓地：宅垗。

垗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhào］
［《廣韻》治小切，上小，澄。］
(1)祭坛四周土墙内的区域。
(2)葬地。

垗字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垗； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页228第03
【廣韻】治小切【集韻】徒了切，?音兆。【說文】畔也，爲四畤界，祭其中。　又祭名。【周禮·春官·小宗伯】垗五帝于四郊，垗山川丘陵墳衍。　又窀穸爲宅垗。【孝經】卜其宅垗，而安厝之。通作兆。凡塋界皆曰垗。　又【集韻】【韻會】?直紹切，音肇。義同。

垗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
垗字的起名意思

暂无。

垗
Basic explanation of words
垗
zhào
The place within the soil wall around the altar.
Cemetery: Zhailan.
垗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhào］
["Guangyun" treats small cuts, upper small, clear. ]
(1) The area inside the earth wall around the altar.
(2) Burial place.
垗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垗; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 228 03
[Guang Yun] Zhi Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] It’s a silly cut, it’s a sign. 【Said the text】Pan Ye, for the four worlds, sacrifices among them.　Also called the festival. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Xiao Zongbo】The five emperors are located in the suburbs, and the graves of the mountains and rivers are spread out.　 and 窀穸 is the house. 【Book of Filial Piety】Bu Qi's house, and Ancuozhi. Pass as a sign. Every burial world is called 垗.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Zhi Shaoqie, sound Zhao. The same meaning.
